name: The Embers of the Stars
description:
You are the last person on the last planet orbiting the last dying star in the universe.

What was it all for?

Works best in Chrome or Firefox; internet explorer and Edge are not supported.

This is a digital text written as part of whynICHt: Scifi Time, a seasonal word-collection. 

Credits:

Design and writing: Daniel Adams and James Patton

Cover image: NASA/ESA/G. Bacon (STScI)
